content:
hello every body,
could please give some tips about the configuration of the cacerts and ssl for the fhir server?
thanks :)
Seems to be a duplicate of the question in #hapi.
@Mareike Przysucha sorry, i am new here :see_no_evil:

No problem and welcome to zulip. It's more a hint for others. It's easier for all if each question is asked in just one stream, as otherwise the same discussion is led it two places. I was a bit in a hurry, thus the short note.
